markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 7" pfs="Standard">[Visions of Danger](/Spells.aspx?ID=358)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 381 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Fey](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=7)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 30-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Will

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

An illusion of horrific creatures fills the spell's area. The creatures look like Tiny swarming monsters with a specific appearance of your choice, such as Hellish flies or animated saw blades. The burst deals 8d8 mental damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save) to each creature that's inside the burst when it's created, enters the burst, or starts its turn inside the burst. A creature that critically succeeds at its Will save can immediately attempt to disbelieve the illusion. A creature that tries to Interact with the monsters or observes one with a [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) action can attempt to disbelieve the illusion. Creatures that disbelieve the illusion take no damage from the illusion thereafter.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The mental damage increases by 1d8.
name: Visions of Danger

---

<summary>
Create a vision of horrid, swarming creatures that causes mental damage.

</summary>
summary: Create a vision of horrid, swarming creatures that causes mental damage.
summary_markdown: Create a vision of horrid, swarming creatures that causes mental damage.
text: Visions of Danger Source Core Rulebook pg. 381 4.0 Tradition Occult Bloodline Fey Cast Three Actions material, somatic, verbal Range 500 feet Area 30-foot burst Saving Throw Will Duration 1 minute --- An illusion of horrific creatures fills the spell's area. The creatures look like Tiny swarming monsters with a specific appearance of your choice, such as Hellish flies or animated saw blades. The burst deals 8d8 mental damage (basic Will save) to each creature that's inside the burst when it's created, enters the burst, or starts its turn inside the burst. A creature that critically succeeds at its Will save can immediately attempt to disbelieve the illusion. A creature that tries to Interact with the monsters or observes one with a Seek action can attempt to disbelieve the illusion. Creatures that disbelieve the illusion take no damage from the illusion thereafter. --- Heightened (+1) The mental damage increases by 1d8.
